MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43, EH44 and EH45 postcode area of Walkerburn, Innerleithen and Peebles. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to complete the final repair following a grounded overhead line and faulty fuse unit.. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:47pm on Friday, 4th December 2020
